name: com.unity.scripting.python
description: Python Scripting is an integration of the open-source Python for .NET project. This package provides the means to import the Python Runtime Environment as a namespace and execute Python scripts from the Unity Editor.

_upm.changelog:
* Updated the binaries package to 1.2.0-pre.2, which upgrades Python to version 3.9.10
* Added Ubuntu 18.04, 20.04 support
* Added native macOS arm64 support
* Updated the Python for .NET DLL to 3.0.0-a2

REMOVED
* pip-tools is now packaged as part of the binary distribution

samples.description: Demonstrates how to build a custom tool with a PySide UI with two-way interaction with Unity: it inspects the Unity scene to get the list of cameras, but also Unity tells the UI when cameras are added.
